label: A2B_mC12_12_2i_i-006
title: $\alpha$-Bi$_{2}$Pd Structure
comments:
This is the room-temperature structure of Bi$_{2}$Pd.  Above 380-390$^\circ$C, depending on the exact composition, this transforms into $\beta$-Bi$_{2}$Pd, which has the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_tI6_139_a_e-001}{tetragonal MoSi$_{2}$ ($C11_{b}$) structure} (Villars, 2018). 
 $\alpha$-Ba$_{2}$Pd shares the same AFLOW label, A2B\_mC12\_12\_2i\_i, with \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mC12_12_2i_i-004}{CaC$_{2}$-III} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mC12_12_2i_i-007}{OsGe$_{2}$}.  The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
